subject: Sentences (Criminal)
Basketball
Assaults
organizations: State University of New York at Binghamton
lead_paragraph: A court in Belgrade, Serbia, sentenced a former Binghamton University player to two years and three months in jail for beating a fellow American student into a coma.
snippet: A court in Belgrade, Serbia, sentenced a former Binghamton University player to two years and three months in jail for beating a fellow American student into a coma.
